message: Over 600,000 Veterans who used Veterans Affair services as recently as 2016 were diagnosed with PTSD
5 out of every 100 active duty Service Members were estimated to have PTSD after deployment
For those in infantry units that experienced combat, 13 out of every 100 Service Members had PTSD
Don’t be afraid to seek out help and support to help you deal with any stress you’re experiencing.
Do you want to know about PTSD more?
